Deputy CEO at DMG (DSNR Media Group)

Served for 5 years as DSNRâ€™s Head of Media Buying & Internet Campaigns, and later became co-Founder & co-CEO of DSNR Media Group.

Bringing the media perspective as well as a profound understanding of advertisersâ€™ needs, she was instrumental in the establishment of DMGâ€™s advertising network and its rapid positioning as one of the top 5 European ad networks, with over 350 clients worldwide - placing the company at the forefront of the global media industry.
